objects.text: • 925 Sterling Silver • Gift for Her • 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*

- Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 65 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner features an elegant and feminine promotional design for a jewelry product. It uses a soft radial pink gradient background with a white circular center to attract focus. The main headline (id: `heading`) is bold and eye-catching, positioned at the top in a rich rose color. Just below it, the subheading (id: `subheading`) presents the product name in a stylish, serif typeface with a purple hue. The central image (id: `product_image`) showcases a pair of rose gold stud earrings, perfectly centered within the white circle.

On the upper right area of the circle, a circular gradient-filled price tag (id: `price`) stands out in white text on a rose-to-coral gradient circle. The footer contains a brief description (id: `description`) of key selling points in italic text. A “SHOP NOW” call-to-action button (id: `cta_button` and `cta`) lies at the bottom center in a deep magenta background with white bold text.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Pink: `#FFF5F6`
- Rose Pink: `#C2185B`
- Orchid Purple: `#9C27B0`
- Coral Gradient: `#FFA3A8` to `#FF8B92`
- Price Tag Gradient: `#FFCCD0` to `#FFC1C5`
- Deep Magenta (CTA Button): `#C2185B`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a visually appealing pair of earrings that combines elegance with femininity through a refined color palette. The dominant hue is a soft rose gold (#EAAEC2), wrapped around delicate crystal-like gems that have a radiant white sparkle (#FFFFFF) and translucent shimmer. A subtle pastel pink (#FADADD) fills the petal-shaped stones, adding a gentle contrast while blending seamlessly with the rose gold framework. The reflective silvers in the marquise-cut gems (#DDE3E9) enhance the brilliance, creating depth and luxurious appeal. For an advertisement banner, these colors harmonize a romantic and premium look, drawing attention while maintaining elegance.
